overview.value: The Play Area contains a drainable beaker, a solution dropper, water faucet, and a movable pH probe. Water faucet and solution dropper sit above the beaker. The dropper dispenses a number of everyday liquids one at a time.

controlArea.value: The Control Area has a button to reset the sim.

interactionHint.value: Add solution to beaker and play.

case2.value: Currently, beaker contains {{solutionTotalVolume}} liters of {{solute}} and is {{totalVolume}}.

case3.value: Currently, beaker contains {{solutionTotalVolume}} liters of {{solute}} and is {{totalVolume}}. {{solute}} has a pH of {{solutionPH}} and is {{phDescription}}.

case4.value: Currently, {{solute}} solution is {{soluteColor}} with {{addedWaterColor}} {{solute}} and added water. Beaker is {{totalVolume}} at {{solutionTotalVolume}} liters.

case5.value: Currently, {{solute}} solution has a pH of {{solutionPH}} and is {{phDescription}}. Solution is {{soluteColor}} with {{addedWaterColor}} {{solute}} and added water. Beaker is {{totalVolume}} at {{solutionTotalVolume}} liters.

case6.value: Currently, {{solute}} solution is {{soluteColor}} with {{addedWaterColor}} added water. Beaker is {{totalVolume}} at {{solutionTotalVolume}} liters.

case7.value: Currently, {{solute}} solution is lighter {{soluteColor}} with {{addedWaterColor}} added water. Beaker is {{totalVolume}} at {{solutionTotalVolume}} liters.

case8.value: Currently, {{solute}} solution has a pH of {{solutionPH}} and is {{phDescription}}. Solution is {{soluteColor}} with {{addedWaterColor}} added water. Beaker is {{totalVolume}} at {{solutionTotalVolume}} liters.

case9.value: Currently, {{solute}} solution has a pH of {{solutionPH}} and is {{phDescription}}. Solution is lighter {{soluteColor}} with {{addedWaterColor}} added water. Beaker is {{totalVolume}} at {{solutionTotalVolume}} liters.

probeHelpText.value: Look for pH probe to play. Once grabbed, use keyboard shortcuts to move probe. Space to release.

soluteComboBoxHelpText.value: Choose an everyday liquid for the dropper.

waterFaucetHelpText.value: Add water to solution in beaker.

drainFaucetHelpText.value: Open to drain solution from beaker.

liquidGoingUp.value: Level going up, now at {{totalVolumeValue}} liters.

liquidGoingDown.value: Level going down, now at {{totalVolumeValue}} liters.
